definitions: To handle or control (a tool, mechanism, etc.), typically in a skillful manner.
To control or influence (a person or situation) cleverly, unfairly, or unscrupulously.
To move or control (a part of the body or a joint) by hand, especially as a form of treatment or examination.
examples: She knows how to manipulate the data for her report.
He tried to manipulate his friends into doing what he wanted.
The therapist will manipulate the patient's spine.
